ai-patthana18.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.13:0.3_0: And for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana18.13:1.1_0: But by means of the cause, conditioned by causes and reasons don’t arise because of causes.
ai-patthana18.13:2.1_0: No cause for the sake of courseing, both for the sake of cause and reason.
